Posts.Content: are you constipated? maybe its that? ive just had my 3rd fect and have struggled with constipation since the beginning. Taking laxatives every day but v sore below :(
Posts.Title: Pain in stomach during chemo

Posts.Content: I had my 1st tax last wed and agree steroids disrupt ur sleep pattern. Sleeping well now tho, infact can't stay awake longer than abt 8.30pm! It's the taste buds that are the worst part for me so far. Food tastes horrible. Slightly aches neck and slightly tingly fingers and skin is v dry but nothing terrible. Just want to taste food
Posts.Title: Finished fec and start tax on Wednesday but feeling really nervous...
